'USSEnhance(AM-437/MSO-437)' was an ''Aggressive''-class minesweeper acquired by
the U.S. Navy for the task of removing mines that had been placed in the water
to prevent the safe passage of ships.

Enhance was launched 11 October 1952 by Martinolich Shipbuilding Co., San
Diego, California; sponsored by Mrs. A. C. Martinolich; reclassified MSO-
437, 7 February 1955; and commissioned 16 April 1955, Lieutenant R. P. Green
in command.
categories: Ships built in San Diego, California
